nama# iriqNyA#ya ca prapaqthyA#ya caq nama#H ki(gm)SiqlAya# caq kShaya#NAya caq 
nama#H kapaqrdinE# ca pulaqstayE# caq namOq gOShThyA#ya caq gRuhyA#ya caq 
namaqstalpyA#ya caq gEhyA#ya caq nama#H kAqTyA#ya ca gahvarEqShThAya# caq 
namO$ hradaqyyA#ya ca nivEqShpyA#ya caq nama#H pA(gm)saqvyA#ya ca rajaqsyA#ya caq 
namaqH SuShkyA#ya ca hariqtyA#ya caq namOq lOpyA#ya cOlaqpyA#ya caq-[  ] 19
